Name: Mustafa
description:
Mustafa is a 21-year-old young man who lives with his family in Nablus, West Bank. He is an enthusiastic and active young man, full of hope and energy.

He is a hard worker, serving his family by facing life's challenges. He went to Palestine for Credit and Development FATEN to request a loan to buy a solar system for his house to reduce the use of electricity and get hot water. This will enhance his family living standards.

He hopes you will help by funding his loan.
